page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
Employment
Most people who have jobs in Withernwick travel out of the village to other places like Hull, York, Aldbrough, Hornsea and even to the Falkland Islands <but not daily>. Although Withernwick is in a farming area most people don't work on farms.
There is a variety of occupations that people do who live in Withernwick Here is a list of some of them. Nurse Shop assistant Teacher Diver Aeroplane fitter Sailor Farmer Hairdresser Dustman Barmaid Policeman Solicitor Engineer Secretary Gardener
